items.headline: My Taiwanese immigrant friend started working in Walmart for minimum wage and retired with $2 million. What was her secret?
items.summary_en: “She owns two houses and lives with a disabled son.”

items.headline: Tilray’s stock takes off on hope that cannabis will soon be treated more like steroids than heroin
